channel.title: guru on ryan jennings
channel.description: Recent content in guru on ryan jennings

item.title: why golang
item.description: Have become a fan boy of golang as a replacement for my beloved C purely because it is so simplified, and thus a guru language to me. As it stands now, I am somewhat burned out in the depths of a mid-life crisis and pandemic. Do not have, or want, the memory capacity for anything more complex or verbose. A language like go meets these soft skill requirements more than others:
